{{flavour|A prank scroll that creates a loud noise when read.}}

Reading a [[scroll of noise]] causes a loud clanging [[noise]] to emanate from the player's location, alerting monsters to your presence. At 25 intensity, this is more than twice as loud as [[Shout|shouting]] by pressing '''[[t]]'''.

==Strategy==
*If you haven't identified scrolls of noise yet, be wary of read-identifying scrolls near unexplored areas, especially away from [[stairs]]. If one of your scrolls happens to be a scroll of noise, there's no telling what sort of things you'll wake up.
*If you utilize shouting in your play style to draw monsters to you (e.g. ambushing, hit & run with stairs, verifying an area is cleared of monsters, etc.), a scroll of noise is not entirely useless to you, as its greater [[noise]] will draw monsters from further away. Keep that in mind as you run across them.

==See Also==
*[[Noise]]

==History==
*Prior to [[0.20]], scrolls of noise could be used to snap yourself out of [[mesmerize|mesmerization]] or [[fear]].
